channel.title: Cosmic Pkz
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][u]Cosmic Pk[/u][/size][/center] [color=orange][size=14pt][center]The Motherland Of Pkers[/center] [center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/nxonbt.png[/img][/center] Hello Guys, I have been working on Cosmic Pkz for sometime, so I will show you updates that are done and will be done. Here is my dev team: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517209.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517209.0.html[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.cosmicpkz.isgreat.org/]http://www.cosmicpkz.isgreat.org/[/url] [center][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img][/center]
[color=blue]Switching - 100% (and I do mean 100%) Claws - 100% (formula is perfected) All Godswords Specials and stances - 100% Spirit shields are 100% DragonFire shield - 100% Chaotic weapons -100% New and improved quest tab New skills tab All Pvp armour and weapons - 100% Combat is amazing, more hits and less 0s Functioning Lottery system Donators get amazing features Places get donate interfaces upon login and when clicking on donator features Curses working 100% Sexy Looking hitsplates Custom user titles Summoing 100% (Storing, droping, specials) Fight Pits - 100% Member statuses Admin Panel Clan Chat 100% Control Panel Functioning 100%
Things That hopefully will be added:
Handcannon Zombie Minigame War Minigame More Pk'ing locations
[center][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3238/mediazf.jpg[/img][/center] Videos: Halloween Event. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PmzavTMRbcQ[/youtube] Full Screen Toggleing [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bo_gp8SQZXI[/youtube] Easter Ring [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gp8TGvlDm5A&feature=mfu_in_order&list=UL[/youtube] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/5pefih.gif[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/203u3p.jpg[/img] Server base going under massive construction, will post pics when I have time. [center][img]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/3142/creditsjf.jpg[/img][/center] -Sanity -Myself - Kozs -Frank

item.title: Cosmic Pkz
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

[quote=“lostmyphat, post:8, topic:418129”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=520678.msg3781981#msg3781981 date=1318558514]
Highly doubtful, anyways… the only thing i see unique is the pking area. The loyalty titles were released in a tutorial on gay-server and your summoning shit came with the server. Give me something unique to like. XD
[/quote]
^
Sorry, but a PI looks like every other PI. Overloads, torva, korasi…[/quote]

Agreed, But we are working on a server that is entirely pk’ing/Minigame based. We currently working on castle wars then will move onto Bounty Hunter.

Read full topic

[center][size=18pt]Cosmic Pk[/size][/center]
[color=orange][size=14pt][center]The Motherland Of Pkers[/center]
[center][/center]
Hello Guys, I have been working on Cosmic Pkz for sometime, so I will show you updates that are done and will be done.
Here is my dev team:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517209.0.html
Forums: http://www.cosmicpkz.isgreat.org/

[center][/center]

[color=blue]Switching - 100% (and I do mean 100%) Claws - 100% (formula is perfected) All Godswords Specials and stances - 100% Spirit shields are 100% DragonFire shield - 100% Chaotic weapons -100% New and improved quest tab New skills tab All Pvp armour and weapons - 100% Combat is amazing, more hits and less 0s Functioning Lottery system Donators get amazing features Places get donate interfaces upon login and when clicking on donator features Curses working 100% Sexy Looking hitsplates Custom user titles Summoing 100% (Storing, droping, specials) Fight Pits - 100% Member statuses Admin Panel Clan Chat 100% Control Panel Functioning 100%

Things That hopefully will be added:

Handcannon Zombie Minigame War Minigame More Pk'ing locations

[center][/center]

Videos:
